Name: Venture Undersuit Blue/Black
Description:
Item Type: Flightsuit

Whether you’re discovering bold new frontiers or simply stretching your legs after a long spaceflight, Robert Space Industries’ Venture Explorer Suit takes vacuum-safe wear to the next level with its incorporation of top-of-class safety features seamlessly blended with phenomenal freedom of movement.
